title: FPS issues on my new new computer.
body: So I bought a new computer the other week and I can play most games at max graphics with 60+ FPS. When I play League though it stays at 30 or below and occasionally will jump to 300+. Does anyone know what I can do to fix this issue? I know it isn't that my computer isn't strong enough to run it.

replies.body: New rigs usually need a hefty update with Windows and drivers to make sure everything runs well with current content.  Go through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure that everything is tuned up and ready to play!  Let me know if you have any questions!

I went through most of the steps on the list and I'm looking at getting a laptop cooler in the next couple of days. So far nothing has worked. If the laptop cooler doesn't help do you have any recommendations?

It's really important to go through every step to rule out any possibilities.  A cool is always good but I'm not sure if it will help without going through everything else first.  If none of the instructions resolved the issue then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.  

Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some contextual logs to your ticket, and our tech team will assist individually.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
